title: Top 5 Resorts to Experience Snow - MiceKart Blogs
paragraphs: The Grand Dragon, Ladakh:The only star hotel in Leh Ladakh region, take in stunning views of the imposing Himalayan mountains and the valley, winters offer views of snowcapped mountains for visitors. As the temperature drops, sit out by the bonfires, host barbecues with your team and bond over great food and fond memories.

Oberoi Wildflower Hall, Shimla:A fine way to go glamping, the Oberoi’s Wildfire offers breathtaking views of lush green forests and hills. Head out on nature walks, rafting and bicycle tours, or just unwind and rejuvenate with yoga and meditation on the grounds. The property offers unmatched views of the Himalayas, and the clearest skies you could ever view!

JW Marriott Mussoorie Walnut Grove Resort & Spa:There’s no better way to fall in love with the mighty Himalayas than from the hotel’s grand views on offer. The 5-star property boasts over 4,000 square feet of modern venue space, making it the ideal destination for large team events. Relax amidst the grand hills, breathe in the fresh mountain air and forget all about the urban nightmares that await back home.

Vivanta Dal View, Srinagar:Located on top of a hill, this proerty offers a panoramic view of the picturesque Dal Lake below. Spread across 6 acres, it is surrounded by foreboding peaks of the Zabarwan Mountains. Soak in the scenic wonders of Paradise on Earth, the houseboats in the lake, and treat your tastebuds to authentic Kashmiri Wazwan when here.

The Khyber, Gulmarg:One of the finest luxury properties in Gulmarg, this is probably the best way to experience Paradise on Earth – Srinagar. Drive through rolling meadows of the lushest green and gentle forested slopes till you arrive at the resort. There are many fun activities to keep you busy – from skiing down snowy slopes, to heading out on treks and picnics through forests and flower-carpeted meadows. You may never want to leave once you get here!
